de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine

Class AbstractState

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine.AbstractState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    State
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultClientClientWorkingState, DefaultClientDecidedState, DefaultClientInitState, DefaultClientRetryState, DefaultClientServerWorkingState, DefaultCommonEndState, DefaultCommonErrorState, DefaultServerClientWorkingState, DefaultServerDecidedState, DefaultServerInitState, DefaultServerRetryState, DefaultServerServerWorkingState

    public abstract class AbstractState
extends Object
implements State
    Generic TNC(C/S) session state base. Especially important for inheritance. Implements all methods as unsupported operation. Methods must be overwritten to work properly. Holds the successor state.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private State successor

      Constructors

      protected AbstractState()
      Creates a generic base for a session state.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TnccsBatch collect()
      Instructs the state to collect messages as batch and return the message batch.
      State getConclusiveState()
      Returns the following state after one of the processing methods (e.g. collect or handle) was executed.
      State getProcessorState(TnccsBatch result)
      Returns the next state to execute one of the processing methods with (e.g. collect or handle).
      protected State getSuccessor()
      Returns the successor state if set.
      TnccsBatch handle(TnccsBatchContainer batchContainer)
      Instructs the state to handle a message batch and return resulting messages as batch.
      protected void setSuccessor(State successor)
      Sets the successor state.

      • getProcessorState

        public State getProcessorState(TnccsBatch result)
        Description copied from interface: State
        Returns the next state to execute one of the processing methods with (e.g. collect or handle). The type of the message batch determines the state.
        Specified by:
        getProcessorState in interface State
        Parameters:
        result - the message batch to determine the state
        Returns:
        the state for processing
